articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: The EU might need to reassess Microsoft's Activision Blizzard deal after restructuring - The Verge
articles.description: The European Commission may need to look further into Microsoft’s restructured Activision Blizzard deal. It follows Microsoft restructuring the deal in an attempt to appease UK regulators.
articles.content:
